--- alter_table_set_on_delete.sql
alter table foo set on delete cascade
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.FQN{
    Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 12,
      NameEnd: 15,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.SetOnDelete{
    Set:         16,
    OnDeleteEnd: 37,
    OnDelete:    "ON DELETE CASCADE",
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo SET ON DELETE CASCADE
